actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to remove certain restrictions from certain previous conveyances of lands in the State of Washington.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to remove specified restrictions from specified previous conveyances of lands in the State of Washington to enable Eastern Washington University to exchange such lands for other suitable lands to be used for educational and recreational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain restrictions from certain previous conveyances of lands in the State of Washington.
